statements: SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT username FROM UserProfiles WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE preferences->>'language' = 'English';
SELECT user_id, address FROM UserProfiles ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT username, email FROM UserProfiles ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31'
SELECT user_id, address FROM UserProfiles WHERE address ILIKE '%Street%'
SELECT user_id, preferences->>'theme' AS theme_pref FROM UserProfiles WHERE preferences->>'language' = 'English'
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT username, email, first_name FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE blockchain_enabled = true;
SELECT username, last_name FROM user_profiles ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT email, first_name FROM user_profiles ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, theme FROM user_preferences WHERE blockchain_enabled = TRUE AND notification_enabled = FALSE;
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM user_profiles WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles INNER JOIN user_preferences ON user_profiles.user_id = user_preferences.user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT user_id, birthdate FROM user_profiles ORDER BY birthdate DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE notification_pref = TRUE;
SELECT service_name, description FROM blockchain_services WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE birthdate > '1990-01-01';
SELECT user_id, service_name FROM blockchain_services WHERE service_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE language = 'English' ORDER BY preference_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(service_id) AS service_count FROM blockchain_services GROUP BY user_id HAVING service_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT service_name, base_price FROM blockchain_services WHERE base_price > 100;
SELECT user_id, service_id, subscription_date FROM user_service_mapping ORDER BY subscription_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';

SELECT user_profiles.username, user_preferences.theme_preference, blockchain_services.description FROM user_profiles INNER JOIN user_preferences ON user_profiles.user_id = user_preferences.user_id INNER JOIN blockchain_services ON blockchain_services.service_id = user_preferences.preference_id;

SELECT user_profiles.username, blockchain_services.service_name FROM user_profiles LEFT JOIN user_service_mapping ON user_profiles.user_id = user_service_mapping.user_id LEFT JOIN blockchain_services ON blockchain_services.service_id = user_service_mapping.service_id;
SELECT * FROM user_service_mapping WHERE subscription_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY subscription_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles;
SELECT username, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT coin_name, current_price FROM CoinPrices ORDER BY current_price DESC;
SELECT user_id, preferred_coin, notification_enabled FROM UserPreferences WHERE notification_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT username, email, profile_pic_url FROM UserProfiles WHERE username LIKE 'J%';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, profile_pic_url FROM UserProfiles WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE preferred_coin = 'BTC';
SELECT user_id, coin_name, current_price FROM CoinPrices WHERE current_price > 1000;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM UserActivity ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
